help.description:
Essential commands
 Use `*help st` for Storyteller commands â€¢ `*help admin` for setup commands
help.players_content:
`*!` - toggle spectator mode
`*brb` - toggle away status
`*g` - view grimoire link
`*players` - list active players
`*timer` - check active timer
`*consult` - request ST consultation (active game only)
help.spectators_content:
`*spec @user` - shadow follow a player
`*unspec` - stop following
`*dnd` - toggle do-not-disturb
`*shadows` - view all followers
`*join @user` - join someone's voice channel
help.game_info_content:
`/stats` - server statistics
`/gamehistory` - recent games
`*stguide` - storyteller guide
`*credits` - contributors
help.footer: v{VERSION} â€¢ *help st â€¢ *help admin â€¢ Bug reports â†’ hystericca

help_st.title: ğŸ“œ Storyteller Commands
help_st.role_setup_content:
`*st` - claim/unclaim Storyteller role
`*cost` - toggle Co-Storyteller role
`*g <link>` - set grimoire link
help_st.game_mgmt_content:
`/startgame <script>` - start game tracking
`/endgame <winner>` - record game result
`*call` - call all townspeople to Town Square
`*timer <duration>` - schedule a delayed call (e.g., `5m`, `1h30m`)
`*timer cancel` - cancel active timer
help_st.announcements_content:
`*night` - announce nighttime
`*day` - announce morning
`*poll [123ch] <time>` - create script poll
*Example:* `*poll 123 10m` - poll for TB/S&V/BMR, 10 minutes
help_st.footer: v{VERSION} â€¢ *help for main commands â€¢ *help admin for setup

help_admin.title: âš™ï¸ Admin Commands
help_admin.setup_content:
`/setbotc <category>` - create/link a session to a category
`/settown #channel` - set Town Square voice channel (for current session)
`/setannounce #channel` - set announcement channel (for current session)
`/setexception #channel` - set consultation channel (for current session)
`/autosetup` - auto-create gothic server structure

**Note:** Session commands must be run from within the session's category. Each category = one session.
help_admin.session_mgmt_content:
`/sessions` - list all sessions
`/deletesession <id>` - remove a session
help_admin.management_content:
`/sessions` - view server settings and active sessions
`/sessions view <id>` - detailed session info
`/sessions cleanup` - remove inactive sessions
`*changelog` - view version history
`/deletegame <number>` - delete specific game from history
`/clearhistory` - delete all game history
help_admin.multi_session_content:
Run multiple concurrent games by creating multiple BOTC categories!
Each category becomes an independent session with its own:
â€¢ Game tracking â€¢ Timers â€¢ Grimoire â€¢ Player lists â€¢ History
Commands automatically scope to the category you're in.
help_admin.footer: v{VERSION} â€¢ *help for main commands â€¢ *help st for storyteller

stguide.title: ğŸ“œ Storyteller's Guide to Grimkeeper
stguide.description: A quick reference for running smooth BOTC games with this bot
stguide.starting_content:
**Before:**
â€¢ Use `*poll` to let players vote on the script
â€¢ Make sure players are in BOTC voice channels

**Setup:**
**1.** Claim Storyteller: `*st`
**2.** Set your grimoire: `*g <link>`
**3.** Start tracking: `/startgame <script>`
**4.** **Confirm the player roster**
   â€¢ Bot shows who will be tracked
   â€¢ Use ğŸ”„ Refresh if players need to toggle `*!`
   â€¢ Click âœ… Confirm when ready

Without `/startgame`, commands like `*timer`, `*call`, `*night`, `*day`, and `*consult` won't work.
stguide.managing_content:
`*call` - Move everyone to Town Square
`*timer 5m` or `*5m` - Schedule a delayed call
`*night` / `*day` - Post phase announcements
`*players` - See who's in the game
stguide.during_content:
â€¢ Players can use `*consult` to request private ST chat
â€¢ Grimoire link is accessible via `*g` (no args)
â€¢ Timers persist through bot restarts!
â€¢ Use `/addplayer` or `/removeplayer` if roster changes
stguide.ending_content:
**1.** Record the result: `/endgame <Good/Evil>`
**2.** Stats are automatically tracked!
**3.** Check your stats: `/storytellerstats`

*Tip: Use `/addplayer @user` or `/removeplayer @user` during the game if someone joins late or leaves.*
stguide.notes_content:
â€¢ **Co-Storytelling:** Use `*cost` to share ST duties
â€¢ **Private Channel:** ST can use exception channel (excluded from `*call`)
â€¢ **Quick Timers:** `*3m` is faster than `*timer 3m`
â€¢ **Player Tracking:** Uses user IDs, immune to nickname changes
â€¢ **Your Stats:** Individual achievements tracked across ALL servers!
stguide.footer: v{VERSION} â€¢ *help for all commands â€¢ Report issues â†’ hystericca

start.description: The grimoire opens as shadows gather in the town square...
start.footer: Grimkeeper v{VERSION} â€¢ May fate be kind...

end.footer: Grimkeeper v{VERSION} â€¢ The tale is told
good_messages: The last whispers of the Demon's manipulation fade away as the sun rises once more. Truth claims its victory over lies and deceit.
Free from evil, dawn brings justice, and with it comes the end of the Demon's grasp over the village.
Through unwavering resolve, the townsfolk expose their enemies in the dark. The Demon is cast down, and the village reclaims its peace.
Good has prevailed! The evil threat is vanquished, and your town lives to see another sunrise.
As dawn breaks, the final whispers of evil are snuffed out. The townsfolk stand victorious. Bruised, battered, but unbroken.
Good wins! Turns out teamwork, blind panic, and arguing loudly really does defeat demons.
The final vote seals the fate of evil. With the demon gone, the village can at last breathe freely. Good triumphs!
Against all logic, accusations, and five days of utter nonsense, the good team somehow pulls it off. Evil is dead. Enjoy the bragging rights.
evil_messages: With the final flicker of hope being extinguished at last, evil tightens its grip. The town's final breath belongs to the Demon.
As the last ounce of good disappears, silence settles over the cobblestone. The Demon's victory is absolute, and the night belongs to evil.
The final stand of the good team proves fruitless. In the silence that follows the death of the townsfolk, evil's laughter fills the square.
Night falls forever. With the final shred of hope extinguished, evil claims the town.
The demon's plan unfolds flawlessly. As the last good soul falls, darkness tightens its grip. Evil triumphs.
Evil wins! Turns out lying through your teeth does pay off.
As dawn breaks, the town falls silent. The Demon's plot is complete, its minions triumphant. With the good dead or deceived beyond recovery, evil claims the final victory in the town square.
After days of arguing, tunneling, and trusting exactly the wrong people, the town hands victory to evil on a silver platter.

   - `*settown #channel` creates session automatically
   - `*setannounce #channel`
   - `*setexception #channel` (optional)

Each category operates independently with its own grimoire, game history, and timers!

welcome.title: ğŸ©¸ Welcome to Grimkeeper
welcome.description:
Thank you for adding Grimkeeper to your server!

**Important:** Grimkeeper works on a **category-basis**. Game commands require you to set up a BOTC category first.
welcome.quick_setup_content:
**Option 1: Automatic Setup (Recommended)**
Use `/autosetup` to automatically create a gothic-themed BOTC server structure!

**Option 2: Manual Setup**
1. Create a Discord category for your game (any name you want)
2. Create text and voice channels inside that category
3. Run these commands from within a channel in that category:
   - `/settown #voice-channel` - Set Town Square
   - `/setannounce #text-channel` - Set announcements
   - `/setexception #voice-channel` (optional) - Set private ST channel

**Multi-Session Support:**
Create multiple categories and configure each one independently. Session config commands auto-create sessions when used in a category.
welcome.getting_started_content:
â€¢ Type `*help` or `/help` to see all commands
â€¢ Storytellers use `*st` to claim their role
â€¢ Use `/startgame` to begin tracking games
â€¢ Commands are **session-scoped** - they affect only the category you use them in
â€¢ Check out `*changelog` to see what's new!
welcome.permissions_content:
For full functionality, ensure the bot has:
â€¢ Manage Nicknames
â€¢ Move Members
â€¢ Manage Channels
â€¢ Manage Messages
â€¢ Send Messages & Embed Links
â€¢ Add Reactions
welcome.footer: Grimkeeper v{VERSION} | Blood on the Clocktower Discord Bot
